Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and the Pittsburgh Pirates meet Sunday in MLB action from PNC Park.
This will be the final installment in a three-game series.
The Royals will go with Brady Singer as the starter, who is 9-10 with a 3.42 ERA in 29 starts.
The Pirates will have Jared Jones as the starter, who is 6-7 with a 3.82 ERA over the first 19 starts of his MLB career.
